title: WTB: Buffalo Bisons / Blues / Buffeds cards (list inside)
author: cardsmemro

posts.post_title: WTB: Buffalo Bisons / Blues / Buffeds cards (list inside)
posts.post_content:
Here is the list. Would be looking for low to mid grade cards. Thanks for looking and happy to look at anything Buffalo you have that I didn’t list.

T205- Merritt (Hassan)
T213- Chase (all variations)
T214- Downey, Chase, Ford
T216- Engle, Chase
T330-2- Blair, Downey, Ford

Hey Dan:

I will be listing this Bisons PC on eBay beginning Saturday nite and running for a week, if interested.  Picked it up in a little card show years ago in North Tonawanda.

I cannot find any pricing info on it, so I will not quote an asking price.  I would consider any offer you might make, tho.

Happy New Year,
Greg
A little later than tobacco era but let me know if there is an interest.
Thanks guys! Sent you both PMs.
